comments.raw_text: With **tail=false** (prioritize completeness over the most recent events) and using min_id as a checkpoint this *should* prevent us from missing anything but that doesn't appear to be the case. Papertrail provides no data consistency or latency SLA's; maybe we should try reading data that is only X minutes old and see if that helps.
comments.creator: mtrinkala@mozilla.com
